title: Getting LP decay warnings even after playing ranked games.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I started getting LP decay warnings a few days ago, so I started playing some ranked again to keep that from happening. However, I'm getting ranked inactivity warnings upon login, even though I have played ranked recently. Is this something for the end of season? Is it my rank (Plat 3)? Or just a bug? Thanks in advance.

replies.body: It looks like you're ranked in all three queues, so you need to make sure you're playing games in each queue to stop the decay.
Damn, didn't think of Flex or 3's, thanks.
